value.title: Create Power BI calculations for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides guidance on Power BI calculation concepts, and how to create and edit calculations.

value.title: Connect data to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides the foundational information needed to connect to your data confidently with the new platform.

value.title: Introduction to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: The purpose of this module is to help Tableau analysts switch from Tableau to Microsoft Power BI.

value.title: Optimize Power BI performance for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module demonstrates how performance can determine a visual's usefulness.

value.title: Organize and simplify Power BI fields for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides guidance on how to organize and simplify your calculations.

value.title: Create Power BI visuals for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module goes through the basics of creating visuals in Power BI.

value.title: Work with requirements as a solution architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: It is important to capture the customer’s needs accurately. This module explains how to capture requirements and identify functional and non-functional items.

value.title: Analyze collaboration and engagement using the Workplace Analytics Ways of working assessment dashboard
value.excerpt: Learn to evaluate collaboration culture and employee experience with a Power BI template using Workplace Analytics data.
